titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments for the 111th Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
Senate Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
Senate Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

bill.summary: 1/21/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates the minority party membership on specified Senate committees for the 111th Congress.
